      • type

      • push

        public GuiTest push(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode... keys)
        Presses and releases a given key. If multiple keys are passed to this method, they will be released in the inverse order, to allow for pushing key combinations like this:
         push(KeyCode.CONTROL, KeyCode.SHIFT, KeyCode.T)
        (example for Ctrl+Shift+T)
        Parameters:
        keys -

      • push

        Alias for type(character).
        Parameters:
        character -

        Parameters:
        keys - The keys to be pressed.
